mapper.select: SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.openid = #{openid} ORDER BY o.oid DESC

SELECT o.*,(select h.name from vhouse h where h.id in(select p.groups from venues p where p.vid = o.vid)) as changguan_name,(select p.vname from venues p where p.vid = o.vid) as pianchang_name FROM zc_order o WHERE o.openid = #{openid} AND o.type = #{type}
SELECT v.* FROM venues v WHERE v.groups = #{id} ORDER BY v.sort DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM zc_order o WHERE o.vid in (select v.vid from venues v where v.groups = #{id}) AND o.reserveTime = #{date} AND o.type = #{type}
SELECT count(*) FROM periodtime_close c WHERE c.venues_id in (select v.vid from venues v where v.groups = #{id}) AND c.close_date = #{date}
